name: Hurdle Turtle Forever
description:
Hurdle Turtle is back! For this turtle, it's all about pure speed and sweet spin jumps! Compete in the ultimate hurdle challenge in this survival marathon of madness!

Features include:
• Kratos, the God of War himself, runs with the turtles!
• Sgt. John Captain of Newgrounds.com races into battle!
• Remastered HD graphics!
• Master the hurdles with new touch-based controls (for touch screen Windows devices) and double jumps!
• Gamepad support
• Lots of new characters and returning fan favourites!
• Pick up coins on the track to unlock new tracks and characters!
• Tons of planned free updates with new characters, tracks and surprises including guest stars!*

* Current guest stars include Kratos (God of War), Sgt. John Captain (Newgrounds.com), Kebako (Cat Girl Without Salad) and even Santa Claus himself!
